description:
Mixxx 2.4 open-source, free, and cross-platform DJ software is now available for download with numerous new features and improvements. Here's what's new!

The post Mixxx 2.4 Open-Source DJ Software Released with Major Changes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mixxx 2.4 Open-Source DJ Software Released with Major Changes
